website_summaries.verdict: Waterless car wash that is environmentally safe and friendly.
pros: Eco-friendly formula of all natural ingredients is safe to use outdoors without damaging the car's surface
Comes in a variety of sizes for different vehicles
cons: Wiping away the cleaning solution can leave small scratches on the surface of the vehicle

customer_reviews.title: The better waterless wash&wax
customer_reviews.text: I've used this and Meguiar's Ultimate Wash&Wax. I prefer this. Something about it feels gentler, and it does a better job too. This doesn't smell as strongly as the Meguiars, and that smell doesn't stick to my hands like it does with theirs. I found this generally easier to work with, too: Easier to apply, felt more lubricated, and buffed off dry much easier. It also doesn't dry quickly leaving you with dry wax before you're done with a quarter panel. 4 stars because 16oz is just enough to do my entire car and for the same price Meguiars gives you 24oz which at least lets you leave a bit in the trunk for spot-cleans.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Seems good but can suffer from scratches like any waterless wash
customer_reviews.text: Used 1/4 of a bottle on a small hatchback with some light dust. Typically clean in a coin-op wash and hand dry using Meguiars ultimate quik wax. Did not do a great job of loosening up dust on the car, when wiping with a microfiber cloth I could feel the unevenness. Definitely left more micro-scratches than when I started. Maybe diluting and/or really saturating the surface would work better but I'd use the whole bottle for one wash. Going to try it as a drying aid, like how I use ultimate quik wax, and see if that works better.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Black cars beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very difficult to get good results. I watched all the videos, followed the instructions and still didn’t get a good result. I have a black car and the product left a film over the entire car that was a pain to get off. Lots of hard running is the only thing that would get this film off. Car wash took 4 hours and still didn’t get all the film off. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Puente

customer_reviews.title: wish i could give it negative marks
customer_reviews.text: Used this product this morning to "quickly" wash my car with a wax after it rained yesterday. My car was completely clean before the rain so the water did little but make drops from dust collected on the car. After an hour of trying to get the haze to go away i gave up and just washed my car and waxed it with a spray wax. I would not in any way recommend this to anyone. I have used this brands products before and have not had any issues like this. I usually don't write reviews.... asking for a 100% refund
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better than a lay car wash.
customer_reviews.text: Just used this on my car and am very happy with it. It was as easy as spray on and wipe off with a little extra rubbing where the bird poop was. I cleaned my Toyota Avalon using about 1\3 of the bottle, so this 16 oz bottle should be good for 3 cleanings. My car is blowing white now and looks better than when I take it to the car wash and pay $40. There were small droplets on my door that the pay car wash did not get off - the manager said I needed a clay bar to get off. Nope! This chemical guys cleaner got it off. Definitely plan to continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Leo

customer_reviews.title: Spray, wipe, buff Easy
customer_reviews.text: THIS waterless car wash is ABSOLUTELY the best product! I've used numerous brand but nothing compares to it's cleaning or shine. Spray it on, if your car is pretty dirty let the product sit wet for a couple minutes to penetrate the road film and simply wipe off! Wipe in one direction adjusting the cloth to a fresh edge on each stroke to avoid scratches. Then using a microfiber towel wipe to shine/buff shine... no elbow grease needed, just spray wipe and a quick buff and your car will look like you just paid $$$ for a professional detail. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Jonson

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: It was OK. It rained the past 3 days, but I didn't drive in the rain so there were mostly rain spots and pollen on the surface of my car. I have a '17 Mazda 6 and it took me nearly the entire bottle to wipe my mid-sized sedan clean. The stuff is so watery and feels like water so I sprayed a lot more to make myself feel better. This is the first time I've used a waterless wash, I'll be trying other products before buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier S.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great results. Works fast, goes fast
customer_reviews.text: This is the lazy car enthusiast's dream. Good cleaning power, nice smell, and leaves a slick finish without needing any real work whatsoever. The only downsides are the construction of the spray bottle (spring mechanism in the trigger tends to stick) and the fact that you need a lot of it to do a whole car. I would recommend just buying the big 1 gallon bottle and using your own sprayer from your local home improvement store. Aside from that though, it's a 5/5 product.
customer_reviews.author: StudioVRM

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it needs to- and well!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is excellent. Like the manufacturer says, this is for a lightly dirty car- not one with mud or dirt caked onto it. Don’t expect this to work well on a car that hasn’t been washed in months. It’s great for keeping your car clean between washes. Has a great shine and scent, wipes away with almost no effort and leaves no streaks. As someone who’s been detailing cars for 10+ years, I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Waterless Car Wash??? Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: First time I used a waterless car wash product. I was pleasantly surprised and impressed! First off, the smell is great. I know it’s used for the exterior of the car and won’t last but that smell is pretty good. It was very easy to use. Just make sure you have plenty of microfiber towels at hand. I used about 6 of them. After trying this product, I used the Rain-x and McGreggor brands. Even though those brands came in bigger bottles (I believe 24 ounces) they were not as good as the chemical guys. They left streaks and didn’t not smell as good. Next time I will be getting the bigger size. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you wash your car often, this product will change your life
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING. I wash my car with it every week and it makes my life so easy. I never ever need to go to the car wash, I just spray this stuff on and wipe it off with a microfiber towel it leaves my car is shiny and beautiful. Using it seriously reminds me of one of those infomercials where the product magically and effortlessly removes dirt and it seems too good to be true, except this stuff isn't!!
customer_reviews.author: Shina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible spray bottle - had 3 break
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but the spray bottle is so poorly designed, i've had 3 of them break. Bottle worked so i bought another. Bottle 2 didn't spray so i returned it. Bottle 3 didn't spray either and amazon won't let you exchange a product twice. Best is that it leaked everywhere too. Bought another one and THAT one also has a faulty nozzle. save yourself the trouble and buy the bulk bottle and a high quality spray bottle. stock one is junk
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed!
customer_reviews.text: My car has never been so shiny! Before I used this, my car was super dirty. It had bird crap all over it and road grime. I did a pre-wash to get all the loose dirt off. Then used a light layer of the waterless wash and it was amazing! As the directions state, it leaves behind a very light wax layer. So I went over that wax layer with a new microfiber towel to buff it out and man did it shine! I will definitely buy this again! The picture attached is kind of dark, but even in the dark you can see the car shine!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Eco ready!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It does what it says. It’s literally a car wash in a bottle. I see that some people on YouTube and other reviews had problems or didn’t like the product. They said it was just like water in a bottle,but I didn’t have a problem with this. I used probably a quarter of the bottle to clean the whole car, top to bottom. So long review short. It’s worth the money and makes your car looking nice and pretty. I’m very happy with the product that I bought a gallon of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Belmontes

customer_reviews.title: WOW WOW WOW! A MUST HAVE for anyone who loves a clean car!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I can’t believe how good my car looks. I bought this after using the Armorall bucketless car wash wipes... hugely disappointing... thought to give this a try & wow... I really didn’t expect much more than the Armorall product did .. i am amazed at how good a job it does... it looks like I just washed & waxed my car. Super easy to use ... spray, wipe, light buff .. done .. my car was mildly dirty w salt on the bottom of the doors and underside .. I will absolutely be buying the largest size
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great for spot cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I would not use for a whole car clean but when you have a spot or dirt but it does not require you to wash the whole car, this is perfect. I washed my car 2 days ago and noticed water spots on the rear hatch at the corners of my windows. Simple spray and wipe in one direction and with a clean town buff it. There is a wax in it so if you do not clean it all off you will see that white wax residue form.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This waterless car wash works great on a dusty garage kept car. Just spray it on lightly and wipe, then with another clean micro fiber cloth buff it. This bottle is small but a little goes a long way. It cleaned up my mercedes amg convertible perfectly after getting dusty in the garage all winter. It has carnuba wax in it so it gives a deep glass shine. Now I would not want to use it on a really dirty vehicle because you will need a case of rags and heavy dirt could scratch the finish. Also the smell of the product is good. Another great product from the Chemical Guys!
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. However, I finished almost half the bottle for one cleaning. I have a 2017 Honda CRV and used this product 2 weeks after a regular wash. I think this product should be used once per week or at least where I live in NYC. I will try the concentrated gallon version and see if that will extend the longevity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: My car looks fantastic! I am definitely buying either the gallon bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: The chemical itself if 5 stars, the bottle is what brings it down. My small hatch back took about 1/3 of a bottle, but it was my first time. My car looks fantastic! I am definitely buying either the gallon bottle or the concentrated bottle after this. I usually take my car to get washed and then detail it with another spray cleanser. This skips the middle man. And at this being the most expensive chemical guys option at less than $4 for a wash? I'm sold! Now my wife will love my clean car and already love the savings over what I've done before.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T

customer_reviews.title: Best lite car cleaner & wax on the market
customer_reviews.text: Chemical Guys make outstanding products. Been using this waterless car wash & wax for a few months now and find that a little dab will go a long way. Just do small sections at a time in the shade. Very easy to polish, just a little will work wonders. Greatly helps keeping the car sparkling clean with a bright just waxed look. Their black plastic surface wax is another super product that I use. Highly recommended products.
customer_reviews.author: 1Savy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, please improve the sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, using this on a pristine car finish that was a bit dirty. Would it cause scratching?. Nope.....it works great. I am hooked, it is really easy to use, smells great and leaves my finish looking shiny and slick as can be. All this without the mess of a traditional wash. Only thing they could improve is the sprayer, it failed mid way through the bottle, and I had to put it another bottle. That is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It's love bug season. The nasty wantons splashed and splattered goo and corpses all over my car. I just hosed off the biggest body parts, and then, in the quiet shade of the garage when the car was mostly dry, sprayed and wiped the cleaner. And it worked. More bugs the next day, and then the rains came. I braved the downpour in a swim suit with a microfibre cloth. In the cool rain with thunder sounding and lightning flashing I easily wiped the car clean. The slaughtered couplers swiped right off the slick surfaces of the car. Yes, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carleniated

customer_reviews.title: Loves to attract dust
customer_reviews.text: Not the best waterless product with a wax, it’s a easy application and it does indeed clean and shine the vehicle, however the down side is it’s a magnet for dust / airborne particles, was dissatisfied that overnight my Truck was covered with all that floats in the air, the glossy shine the day before is gone so I’ll be passing on purchasing this product again,
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best motorcycle wash!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend to use on his motorcycle & it works great! It keeps it looking brand new even though it’s several years old. He enjoys going out and cleaning it with this & a microfiber cloth. We live in an apartment so we don’t have access to a hose or other typical car washing necessities so this is ideal!
customer_reviews.author: adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Cheap spray trigger.
customer_reviews.text: Product seems great, cleaned my car very well. I was most frustrated by the cheap spray head. First time buy and very first time use, the spray trigger broke. Not having another spray bottle lying around I had to break the cap off and poor it on my micro cloth. After this bottle is done, back to Meguiars.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N

customer_reviews.title: Half a bottle left
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 10-13-2019 used a few times. On feb 5, 2020 with half a bottle left the sprayer just stopped working. So i have a jacked spray bottle i cant get the sprayer out of and half a bottle of liquid i cant get to. This is the first CG product to fail like this out of the 10 I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Nikki

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to remove bird droppings and other debris from from my Prius. I have tried other products like Meguiars Quick Wax which did almost nothing even with a lot of rubbing. With Ecosmart they come off very easily and it leaves a nice wax shine. I also like that not much of the mist goes into the air and into my lungs.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: This item is great. I used it undiluted
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. I used it undiluted. Great result. Unfortunately halfway through the product I decided to dilute it but while opening the top the plastic seal was punctured. I’m not sure if this is normal. This is almost like buying a bottle of water and it’s already open. Kind of weird but other than that it’s great. I honestly think this is a waterless last resort and it can last for only a small amount of washes. I wanted to return it but it’s basically all gone. Don’t know what to do. I ordered another bottle. But overall it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Don

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it promises!
customer_reviews.text: I am AMAZED at how great my car looks after just one use! I spent around 10 mins and my car looks freshly washed. I can't believe how easy it was! Make sure to follow instructions: shake the bottle well and use the fine mist so that you get even distribution. Use one microfiber cloth and go in one direction. Then use another cloth to buff. SO EASY! Perfect for in between car washes. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: April B.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work the way it described. Was incredibly ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work the way it described. Was incredibly streaky and made my car look dirtier. I had to go to a carwash after all.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Good option for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment in LA and using this for a quick touch up on the car is awesome. Makes it look and shine like i waxed and washed it. If my car is extra dirty i typically just power wash at car wash then do one round with this and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: kyle f.

customer_reviews.title: Useful product for areas you want dry.
customer_reviews.text: I have a gmc square body truck with oak wood bed. I purchased this so I could wash and wax my truck bed without water after i wash the rest of the truck. It cleans and polishes the oak wood floor without getting water or polish paste in the cracks between the steel strips and oak planks. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kenpo saber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Since car washes have become very expensive, I decided to try this product. I just finished cleaning my Lexus SUV using the yellow microfiber cloths too. Amazing results . I’m 77 yo and found it easy to do. Was able to do it in my garage too. No streaks. Just a well buffed shine.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool
customer_reviews.text: Great product for people who don’t have access to a hose or brushless car wash nearby. The product WORKS really well. Make sure not to use too much, use in the shade and wipe it off right away. This won’t scratch your car. But if you don’t wipe it off right away and don’t use it in the shade, it will leave white streaks on your car. All in all, great product.
customer_reviews.author: AJG

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is great in a "pinch". I haven't used it on rain dirt, but it works great on dusty cars and cleans off break dust really well. You really need to use a soft cloth to be careful you don't drag dirt along the paint finish and scratch the car. This is great for a car cleaning fanatic like me.
customer_reviews.author: SFFrank

customer_reviews.title: Make an old car look newer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for the sole purpose of "sponge bathing" my 2001 Firebird. What an amazing product! Not only does the car shine, it's smooth. Used it on the windows and wheels and got the same effect. The stuff looks radioactive, but I feel confident that I am not giving my car or myself cancer. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain too much, which isn't common for chemicals guys products these days. It works as intended and the shine it leaves lasts for about two weeks. I like to cut it with some pre mixed ONR. I feel it cleans a little better this way. Still just as shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty Ifty

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this product works at cleaning my corvette .. It is so easy to use and hardly any effort is needed to get the results I want .. Great product i will buy again .. !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my BMW 535 looking like it just got washed :)
customer_reviews.text: I have an almost new black BMW 535 and like to keep it looking like it just came off the manufacturing plant. I wanted a high quality chemical wash that I could use to get rid of light dust and water marks from rain / condensation. This works VERY well, watch their video on how to use it and be sure to roll your rag while wiping. You'll want a second rag because it has wax in it and it does need some light buffing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Prefer Swift Wipe
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I could not find swift wipe anywhere. Even here on amazon it's only found 3rd party at the moment and they raised the price of it. Figured I would give this a try. Not a bad product, but I do not like the wax since I use ceramic and Si02 on my car. Still a good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I've watched the video for using this to clean bird poo. Not sure where I'm going wrong, but it just seems to make a filmy mess. Although it does eventually get it gone with some added scrubbing and water. It smells awful too, but then I am VERY sensitive to smells.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: I like the product, but spray bottle broke with it half full
customer_reviews.text: I'd only used it a couple times, just touch ups to keep the car clean and it worked well. Unfortunately the sprayer broke when the container was still half full. I'd consider buying more, but only in bulk, and using a third party spray bottle or system.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Nason

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy and makes my golf cart look great!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a used golf cart from a fellow golf club member. The cart had been left outside, covered, all winter and was pretty dusty and dirty. I had rinsed it off early but it was still a bit dull in color. Used this product based on a recommendation from a friend and was very happy with how easy it was to apply. And, really happy with the results! I was able to complete the job in about 5 minutes which means I will likely be using it often to keep up the look. Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: larrymicke

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for keeping your vehicle clean on the go. When I mount my GoPro to the side of my Jeep, I don't want my shot to start out dirty (mud, dirt, or water spots). Using this product, I can quickly and easily get any water spots or small amounts of dirt off of the paint before I head out on the trail. While that's what I originally bought it for, it's also been great for regular cleaning when it's too cold outside to wash (I use the product inside a garage) or for little touch ups between full washes. Just remember to always use a soft microfiber towel when wiping off the product. Very nice customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable shine!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the product at the suggestion of a friend. I was skeptical of all waterless wash product but gave it a try. My white Ford truck never looked so good and my wife’s dark grey Honda now has an amazing shine. It’s easy to apply per the directions and wipes off with minimal effort. Be sure to follow application instructions and avoid any heavy grit on the finish to avoid scratching. Also works great on glass, trim and plastic.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I keep a bottle of it in the trunk of my car and use it to clean bird droppings off of my vehicle. This works great for that and for touch ups between washes. Two thumbs up. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Use microfiber cloth for best result
customer_reviews.text: Works well does just what it says helps maintain your car look clean in between car washes use it at least once a week
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Chose this one wrongly based on youtube video. Not for bird poop and tree sap.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on chemical guys youtube video for cleaning bird poop and other specks of dirt. But it is not true. This can be used only for the quick detailer and shine for the already cleaned car. somewhat disappointed by choosing this product for bird poop and sap removal. Used more solution, so no way to return back, so I have to use the rest of the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Arumugam S

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of spray bottle, cost and time involved to transfer.
customer_reviews.text: First off this review is for the Chemical Guys Eco-Smart Waterless Wash and Wax. I have been a long time customer of Chemical Guys products. Attached is a pic of my recent order of 5 bottles of just this one product. There quality of spray bottles have steadily declined. The spray itself is still on par. Do yourself a favor and buy the cheapest empty spray bottle. Forget about contact Chemical Guys customer service. I received an email from their corporate office to head back to Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money, Honestly it kind of smells bad. IT smells like something that gotten rotten. I am not sure how some people recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Not as good as actually washing your car but get most of the dirt off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok.. but definitely did not give me the out of the car wash feel. Lifted dirt but left some rain spots. Without a doubt a good solution for that in between car washes kind of deal. Overall for $10 a good keep in your car solution to keep your car maintained well. Doesn't beat a car wash thou.
customer_reviews.author: HaTTa

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product! I live in an apartment with no facilities for washing my car. I used this today and my car looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: REALLY IS A GREAT PRODUCT, IM A BIG FAN OF CHEMICAL GUYS HAVE MOST OF THERE PRODUCTS, WAS CURIOUS TO SEE HOW THIS STUFF WORKED WITH OUT HAVING TO USE WATER, TO MY SURPRISE IT REALLY DOES WORK GREAT, IT WILL DIRTY UP SEVERAL TOWELS BUT IF THIS IS THE WAY YOU HAVE TO WASH BECAUSE YOU CANT USE A WATER HOSE THEN DONT BE AFRAID ITS REALLY GOOD STUFF WITH WAX BUILT IN.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  poor spray bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean my car, which was pretty dirty. The product works very well. The spray bottle itself, is the problem. My quit working less than halfway through the cleaning. Luckily, I bought two of this product. About three quarters of the way , the second bottle quit. Good product, poor sprayer. At about nine dollars a bottle, it’s not too expensive. But if you can only use half a bottle, it’s not a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: edmund ikari

customer_reviews.title: I've gotta SHINE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Product for your Vehicle paint, very easy too use and the smell is awesome. I use the product every time I wipe my Vehicle down and that's almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher James Theus

customer_reviews.title: Use this to remove the bird crap from your precious body paint
customer_reviews.text: This formulation does a great job removing the bird crap from the paint of my car. You have to apply this the same day before the sun hits the bird crap and permanently etches onto your paint.
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Poor quality spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Got this to detail my car. The nozzle squirted a few times and the stopped working.Wrote in about the problem, no response. So if you have your own sprayer, then maybe buy the refill instead, as this item was defective, your results may vary. UPDATE- Amazon sent me a free replacement, so I increased the review to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: The product works
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised; easy on and easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Burnis Johnson

customer_reviews.title: CG Ecosmart waterless spray
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with a Chemical Guys and this product is great for those on the pinch with out any access to water.
customer_reviews.author: Prawit

customer_reviews.title: You will NOT be disappointed with ANY CHEMICAL GUYS PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE LOVE LOVE ALL CHEMICAL GUYS PRODUCTS!!!! I WILL NEVER USE ANY ITHER PRODUCT ON MY CAR SINCE TRYING CHEMICAL GUYS!!! With Chemical Guys you can NEVER go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, I used a lot of it maybe I over saturated my vehicle, but it seemed like I had to and I didn't have a lot of dirt on my black car. It smells pretty good too my garage smelled good after using it for a few hours. good product it does leave a thin layer of wax when you wipe away.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how well this works
customer_reviews.text: Parked my car under a tree. Spent some time researching what to get. This stuff is AMAZING at not damaging paint and getting caked on bird droppings... that were left there too long.
customer_reviews.author: JM_b17

customer_reviews.title: I live in the midwest and if you own a soft top convertible like I do
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical on trying this product on my 2015 ford mustang gt premium, but I can stand by this product. I live in the midwest and if you own a soft top convertible like I do, you shouldn't trust a machine car wash because it can damage the top. I have used this winter so far and only takes me about 20 minutes to clean my car.
customer_reviews.author: John Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: A must have for car freaks.
customer_reviews.text: A very easy wax, dry clean chemical. I used it to dry clean the engine on my 66 mustang and it worked great. Removed all the dust, dirt and grease grim without having to wash engine with water. Also does a great job on cleaning the exterior and leaves a really nice luster shine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice product that cleans
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to use just like all the other waterless washes. Nice smell as well, not a chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ils0crlI

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just finished using this product after receiving it today, and I am amazed how well it works. I used it in combination with Chemical Guys Microfiber towels and my car is now shiny and looks fantastic, not to mention it smells great. This product had a surprisingly good scent. It was unexpected. For those who want to spot clean or those without access to a hose, this product is for you. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Half of Bottle Leaked Out
customer_reviews.text: This arrived to me broken and half of contents leaked out into box. So be careful. Sprayer won’t work. I just have to turn the bottle upside down to get something to drip out. I didn’t bother seeking a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Incognegro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wrangler in the summer with no top....
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for wrangler owners if you have the top down. Did not spray a lot and I’m about 3/4 into the bottle so I might have to use this sparingly. Scent wasn’t bad but I was able to smell it in my garage a couple hours later. Again, not a big issue, I’m just not a big fan of products that have scents added to them.
customer_reviews.author: CC 76

customer_reviews.title: Beware cheap bottle - very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This could easily be a 5 star product if it were not sent out in such cheap bottles. The spray nozzle stopped working after a few pumps so in order to not stop at half a clean car I replaced it with the identical nozzle from the Chemical Guys Window Cleaner...only to find that after about 20-25 pumps this one failed as well. This now leaves me with 2 useless products that cannot apply and a half clean car.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaobai

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Love this stuff. Bought my dad a bottle and he loves it as well. Great for in between car washes!
customer_reviews.author: dino j.

customer_reviews.title: Spray stops working
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 of these and each bottle the sprayer would just stop working. Went with a different company because of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Broken spray bottle, but the fluid cleans as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The spray bottle does not spray despite trying both spray and stream, plunger seems to be non-functional. Switching to another bottle the fluid works, but I shouldn't have to do that if I'm buying a spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaks!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had used sooner to return in time... horrible product!!! After going over it for at least 2hours it still showed streaks! Not fair I had to pay for this especially when I got it to try to SAVE money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worlds best fast car wash!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have used it on both my white Civic and my black Sequoia. It handled both paint colors the same. You just simply shake it up to distribute (what seems to be more of a liquid clay bar mixed with spray on wax) the eco-smart chemicals, then simply spray and then wipe off, then flip your towel and buff to a shine. I really did enjoy using this product. It also smells good. Beware if you have a larger vehicle though as a 16 ounce bottle is only enough for about 1 - 1 1/2 large SUV's worth of washes.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. I have a Model S Tesla which got ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I have a Model S Tesla which got clear coated and I have been using this recently as an alternative to a traditional hand wash. The shine that this product leaves is even better than when I wash the car with the hose and the chemical guys Pink Sud and a water pressure machine. In addition, it takes so much less time. Highly recommend it. Just make sure that you have at least 6 microfibers available to clean the car. As you will need separate ones for the application and the buffing.
customer_reviews.author: Msolo

customer_reviews.title: Best waterless Car Wash spray
customer_reviews.text: This product does an amazing job and is by far the best waterless car wash I have used. I drive a compact hatchback (Hyundai Veloster) and I used a little over a quarter of the bottle on one wash. NOTE- remember to buff off the carnauba after you while the product off! If you don't, your car will come out streaky and dull. Otherwise, this is the best way to wash your car without a drop of water. The only reason it did not receive a five star rating is because I still prefer a normal wash over this if I am able.
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product leaves the paint with a super shine will definitely buy again. Perfect price Also.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Gurrola

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use when you don’t have that much time to clean your car or if you notice bird poop and you want to clean it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: The Spray bottles are garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I love Chemical Guys products however I have to leave this review. This is the 3rd product I have ordered from them that has the same spray bottle that won't work past 10-20 sprays. It's very very annoying having to find another bottom to swap the contents to. Please fix this problem guys.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The spray bottle would not spray. The customer service technician sent me another and better made spray bottle. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C. Trimble

customer_reviews.title: I give it a 4star because it doesn't protect like a heavy paste wax
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 4star because it doesn't protect like a heavy paste wax. I will tell you it works well and quick. I did my 2014 CAMARO in 40 minutes while it took me 2 hours or better with a paste wax. I really like this stuff so I used it on my HARLEY!! QUICK AND EASY AND DAM MY CAR LOOKS GOOD AFTER USING IT..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff but it is over priced. When it runs out I will but something less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: C-KicksXL

customer_reviews.title: Was able to spray enough to do the gas tank on my motorcycle and that turned out nice. This is my second bottle
customer_reviews.text: I only give it 3 stars because after spraying the bottle 3 or 4 times the spray mechanism quit working! Tried twisting the cap off to check stem, but seems to be secured to the bottle. Was able to spray enough to do the gas tank on my motorcycle and that turned out nice. This is my second bottle, since the first one I ordered Is sitting in some mail mans garage [only received an empty package]. Not gonna hassle with returning this, I'll just find a decent spray bottle and empty the contents once I get the cap off!! I must add Amazon did send a replacement for the first bottle!
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does an awesome job of cleaning and shining my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Shine
customer_reviews.text: Used Chemical Guys EcoSmart a day after I washed my car. I have to say I did notice a difference in how deep the color was after the application. Goes on easy and comes off easy. But I would definitely recommend one thing that most people forget to do. Read the directions so you don't put surface scratches in your car, overall great shine great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff make a second bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really good and I actually was able to add water to it and stretched it into a second bottle and it works like a charm 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Lewis

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Not the best value, the concentrate is far better in that regard. But it works well and gives you a chance to test product without buying a full bottle of concentrate and not knowing how well it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: T. Freese

customer_reviews.title: Great product tho!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend for what it says it’s for. I only use it after I’ve washed the car and somehow there’s still a dirty mark. Never would i use this on a completely dry car.
customer_reviews.author: Octane Motorsport Rentals

customer_reviews.title: being a PROFESSIONAL BUSINESS OWNER & Auto detailer I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I detail vehicle's for a living and yes this is great. But it is not something to use instead on wax. Now in between polishing and waxing is great or to just take some dirt off your car if you don't have a hose.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mc (Mc~Detail🚘✴🧼🧽)💥

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am well impressed with this product. I have used it to clean my new F150 from front to back two times and have noticed 1/2 bottle yet. Works great and I highly recommend. Truck looks brand new each time and the product is a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Williams

customer_reviews.title: This works great for in between washes when you just need to ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great for in between washes when you just need to clean up a small area; like a wheel well arch or fender. I also use it in the winter; after a touch-less car wash I will spray the car down and wipe it with this. Really makes it look like the car was hand washed.
customer_reviews.author: Devin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quick way the clean your vehicles
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I have used on both trucks. Th bottle will last about 3-4 cleaning. The first time I used on my truck it hadn’t seen wax in 2 yrs. Beaded up like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pressley Robinson III

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Ive recently decided to get back into car care and wanted something quick and easy for me since I live in the city in an apartment. This was perfect. Left my car so clean and shiny. It has now been 3 weeks and it is still shiny and wonderful. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Angele

customer_reviews.title: rendering the product useless. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product works fabulous, that's if the bottle doesn't break. the trigger on the spray bottle broke half way through waxing my car, rendering the product useless. Great product, horrible quality of spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: JASON A MARSHALL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, excellent results!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product from chemical guys. Made our expo shine up and easy to use. Best product ever and smells good when applying. After use rain will bead up and dust and dirt will rinse right off.
customer_reviews.author: Sinco

customer_reviews.title: it stopped spraying
customer_reviews.text: Was able to spray a few times and then it stop working. I wasn’t even able to finish the hood of my car. Just like other people said, the sprayer easily gets broken. Not really what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product but delivery driver just throw it in between my door didn't even ring the bell, poor service
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Downs

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the clogging bottle!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and work as advertised. So why the 3 stars review? Poorly designed spray bottle that clogs after some use and the top can’t be removed (without taking a knife to cut it off) and salvage the content.
customer_reviews.author: mklee176

customer_reviews.title: Gives your car a great shine!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shine that this product gives my car. It is really easy to apply and takes a short amount of time to use. Highly recommend this product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

product_meta.title: Chemical Guys WAC_707RU_16 EcoSmart-RU Ready to Use Waterless Car Wash and Wax (16 oz)
product_meta.description: The ultimate solution to washing, waxing and protecting any size vehicle in minutes without wasting time or water is here. Introducing EcoSmart-RU, the ready to use (RU) complete auto detailing system. EcoSmart-RU is an easy to use car care product that you simply spray on, gently wipe dirt and contamination away, and buff-off to a clean high-gloss shine. clean, polish and protect your entire vehicle without water. EcoSmart-RU can be used virtually anywhere, anytime, on a wet or dry surface in the sun or shade. It's more than just a product - it's a complete detailing system in a bottle. EcoSmart-RU was specifically developed to be, well, ready to use. You can simply spray the product out of the bottle onto a dirty vehicle or the product can be re-diluted as desired; 1:1 or even one part product with two parts water. EcoSmart truly is the zero pollution detailing solution. How to Use- Make sure to wash your vehicle in a shaded area and that the vehicle is cool to the touch. Shake well, then spray the product directly onto the surface. Watch as solution emulsifies dirt and grime. Wipe up the dirty solution in one direction with a clean microfiber towel. Buff the area dry with another clean microfiber towel to reveal a high gloss shine!
feature_bullets: Wash, wax and protectant in one
Not just a wash - a waterless detailing system
Can be used on paint, wheels, windows and more
Designed to produce a scratch-free, swirl-free shine
